~MvRuScEqd-yada#kShasaq~ggaM ~MvRuqScEda#dha^^IqShaM ~Myaja#mAnasya praqmAyu#ka(gg) syAqdyaM 
kAqmayEqtApra#tiShThitaH syAqdityA#rOqhaM tasma# vRuScEdEqSha vai vanaqspatI#nAq-mapra#tiShThiqtO&pra#tiShThita Eqva Ba#vatiq yaM kAqmayE#tApaqSuH syAqditya#paqrNaM tasmaiq SuShkA$graM ~MvRuScEdEqSha vai vanaqspatI#nA-mapaSaqvyO#&paqSurEqva Ba#vatiq yaM kAqmayE#ta paSuqmAnth syAqditi# bahupaqrNaM tasmai# bahuSAqKaM ~MvRu#ScEdEqSha vai- [  ] 16
